Reclusa::

She bowed to Hydras, then raised and smiled up at him. "I am pleased
you like the idea,My Commander."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "I like the idea"hissed Hydras"We should develop it more, Reclusa...
Maybe, I can add a special errand in this idea"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Dark Mouse 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, April 22, 2005 9:56 PM
>   Subject: Re: Reclusa
> 
> 
> 
>   Reclusa::
> 
>   She took a step forward and smiled, holding her head up and keeping
>   her form rigid, "I said, if only there was a way to have them deat
>   each other. We would be rid of both at once, not having to forsake a
>   single bot on the venture.  If only there was a way to con those goody
>   goodies into believing that self sacrifice was the only way. Perhaps
>   even going so far as to have them reprogrammed into doing so. Someone
>   could perhaps sneak into thier base and reprogram thier cr chambers.
>   Inserting a program to which they must obey and in killing Unicron get
>   themselves killed in the process. Killing two bots with one shot, as
>   it were."
